name: Chiikawa Soft Straw (Chiikawa)
description:
This is a silicone tree resin straw that is environmentally friendly and can be used multiple times after washing.
・Please wash it before using it for the first time.・When washing the case, please use water or a neutral detergent and wash with a sponge. Do not wash with sponges or items with oil, as it may cause discoloration of the painted parts.
